description: "A plan of the port city of Batavia in the 18th century. Small ships can be seen transporting goods along the river to the pier, and the street plan also includes churches, shopping areas and hospitals, as noted on the map’s detailed legend."
label: "Carte hydro-geo-graphique des Indes orientales, en deca̧ et au dela du Gange avec leur archipel / dresseé et assujettie aux observations astronomiques, par M. Bonne, hydrographe du Roi."
